full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED DPA' BO GCIG PA'I SGO NAS GSHIN PO'I SBYANG CHO GA ZHING SGO 'BYED ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @022A *, ,(CES DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED DPA' BO GCIG PA'I SGO NAS GSHIN PO'I RJES SU 'DZIN PA'I CHO GA ZHING MCHOG SGO 'BYED ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI MANG THOS YON TAN GYIS MDZES PA'I AER TE NI CHOS RJE DANG, KUN RIGS GRVA TSANG GI BLA MA DBU MDZAD CHOS RJE DANG, SLOB DPON AU LEM JI BLO BZANG RIN CHEN DANG, TSOGS CHEN DBU MDZAD BLO BZANG SHES @002B RAB DANG, PI LIG THU BLO BZANG BSTAN PA DBU MDZAD SOGS DON GNYER 'GA' ZHIG GIS NAN TAN CHEN PO CHEN POS YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGO, BSRUNG BA'I CHED DU RJE BTZUN RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO MKHAS SHING GRUB PA'I DBANG PHYUG DZA YA PAntI TA ZHES MTSAN YONGS SU GRAGS PA DE NYID KYI ZHABS KYI RDUL SPYI BOS LEN PA, BKA' 'DRIN GYIS CUNG ZAD MNOS PA BYANG PHYOGS SOG PO'I YUL GRUR 'KHYAMS PA'I PHYOGS MED BLO BZANG ZHI BA MING CAN GYIS SNGON GYI MKHAS PA'I GSUNG RGYUN LA BRTEN NAS BGYIS PA'I 'DIS @023A *, ,KYANG SEMS CAN THAMS CAD 'KHOR BA DANG NGAN SONG GI SDUG BSNGAL LAS THAR TE MYUR DU MNGON PAR RDZOGS PAR 'TSANG RGYA BAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS, DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
